objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#f7f7f7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#e5e5e5;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accent-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0071e3;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#0071e3;stop-opacity:0.1'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#cccccc' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#dddddd' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M0,300 C200,250 400,350 600,300 C800,250 950,320 1080,280 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,780 C150,820 350,750 550,800 C750,850 900,780 1080,820 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='940' cy='200' r='120' fill='#0071e3' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='140' cy='880' r='100' fill='#0071e3' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Complete Apple ecosystem in one package
• Seamless integration with iCloud features
• Powerful performance for professional work
• Perfect starter kit for Apple enthusiasts

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Combo
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem: MacBook Pro, iPad, and iPhone in one package
• MacBook Pro featuring Retina Display with stunning visual clarity
• Sleek aluminum unibody design across all devices
• Seamless integration between devices with iCloud and Continuity features
• MacBook Pro with backlit keyboard and Force Touch trackpad
• iPad with high-resolution display, perfect for creative work and entertainment
• iPhone with Touch ID for enhanced security
• Latest iOS and macOS operating systems pre-installed
• Powerful performance for professional work and everyday tasks
• Perfect starter kit for Apple ecosystem enthusiasts
• Ideal for students, professionals, and creative individuals
• All devices in pristine condition with original packaging

banner_details:
The banner presents a modern, tech-themed promotional layout for an Apple product bundle. It features two prominent heading text layers, `heading_1` and `heading_2`, showcasing bold uppercase titles that emphasize the premium and bundled nature of the offer. A contrasting subheading `subheading` clearly states the product combination. Below it, the `description` layer uses bullet points to outline the advantages of the package in a reader-friendly format. The visual center is anchored by `product_image`, displaying a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone in alignment, visually reinforcing the bundle. Bottom-left features a large price text layer `price` with a vibrant `cta_button` and `cta` text inviting users to take action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #0071e3 (primary accent)
- Slate Gray: #333333 (primary text)
- Light Gray: #666666 (subtext)
- White: #ffffff (background)
- Gradient tones: #f7f7f7 to #e5e5e5 (banner background blend)
product_color: The image features a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone with sleek, metallic silver bodies and black bezels, creating a modern, high-tech look. The central MacBook screen showcases a vivid sunset over a mountainous lake, blending soft pink (#EAB5BF), lavender (#B7A5D3), and warm orange (#EDA883) with reflections of beige (#C6A988) and muted brown rocks (#6A5549). These colors are artistically mirrored in the water, enhancing harmony. The grayscale iPhone display adds contrast, while the ocean-blue gradient (#304C84 to #B3CFE6) on the iPad provides cool balance. For an advertisement banner, a minimal palette of Silver (#C0C0C0), Black (#000000), Pink (#EAB5BF), and Ocean Blue (#304C84) can convey both elegance and innovation.
